page.title: 03A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY
page.content:
{A day in the life of Jayne Thomas.} { My mum normally wakes me up at 8.00am.I have a shower and then I get dressed.I go down stairs and feed my dog and take him out for a walk.When I get back indoors it is normally 8.55am and then my mum takes me and my friend to school.She drops us at the car park and we walk to school from there.
Usually we arrive at school around 9.10am.The whistle goes at 9.15am. While the register is being read we read quietly and at 9.30am we go into the rector's assembly until 9.45am.We have a whole lesson with him until playtime which is at 10.45am until 11.00am.Our next lesson is maths.We have this lesson until dinner time which is at 12.15pm.
